hotels.name: MANDARIN ORIENTAL BANGKOK
hotels.description: Experience unparalleled luxury at the iconic Mandarin Oriental Bangkok, nestled along the Chao Phraya River. This legendary hotel combines traditional Thai elegance with world-class service, offering a serene sanctuary in the heart of Bangkok.

hotels.name: PENINSULA BANGKOK
hotels.description: The Peninsula Bangkok offers a luxurious riverside retreat with stunning views of the Chao Phraya River and Bangkok skyline. Known for its distinctive wave-shaped design, this five-star hotel provides spacious rooms, exceptional dining, and the legendary Peninsula service.

hotels.name: ANANTARA CHIANG MAI RESORT
hotels.description: Anantara Chiang Mai Resort is a peaceful sanctuary on the banks of the Mae Ping River, just a short walk from the famous Night Bazaar. This contemporary resort blends modern design with traditional Thai influences, offering a tranquil escape in the cultural heart of northern Thailand.

hotels.name: TRISARA PHUKET
hotels.description: Trisara, meaning 'Third Garden in Heaven' in Sanskrit, is a tropical paradise nestled on a private bay on Phuket's northwestern coast. This exclusive resort features private pool villas and residences set amidst lush tropical gardens, offering breathtaking views of the Andaman Sea.

hotels.name: CONRAD KOH SAMUI
hotels.description: Conrad Koh Samui is a luxury pool villa resort perched on a hillside overlooking the stunning Gulf of Thailand. Each villa features a private infinity pool with panoramic ocean views, offering an exclusive and secluded retreat on the magical island of Koh Samui.

hotels.name: CLASSIC KAMEO AYUTTHAYA
hotels.description: Classic Kameo Ayutthaya offers comfortable accommodation in the historic city of Ayutthaya, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. This modern hotel provides a convenient base for exploring ancient temples and ruins, with well-appointed rooms and excellent facilities for both business and leisure travelers.

hotels.name: THE SUKHOTHAI BANGKOK
hotels.description: The Sukhothai Bangkok is an oasis of tranquility in the bustling city. This elegant hotel features traditional Thai architecture with modern comforts, surrounded by six acres of lotus ponds and gardens. The award-winning restaurants and serene spa make it a favorite among discerning travelers.

hotels.name: DHARA DHEVI CHIANG MAI
hotels.description: Dhara Dhevi Chiang Mai is an architectural masterpiece designed to resemble an ancient Lanna Kingdom. This sprawling resort features ornate villas and colonial-style residences, extensive wellness facilities, cooking schools, and craft villages that showcase northern Thailand's rich cultural traditions.
